edu.cmu.pslc.logging.util

Class LogFormatUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.pslc.logging.util.LogFormatUtils

  • public final class LogFormatUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for Logging. Handles string escaping.
    Version:
    $Revision: 6719 $
    Last modified by: $Author: alida $
    Last modified on: $Date: 2011-03-17 11:13:06 -0400 (Thu, 17 Mar 2011) $
    Author:
    Benjamin Billings

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String escapeAttribute(java.lang.String attributeString)
      Returns an escaped version of the string suitable for inclusion in an XML attribute.
      static java.lang.String escapeElement(java.lang.String theString)
      Check that the string does not contain any invalid XML characters, if no invalid characters, returns the string, otherwise checks that the characters are escaped properly.
      static java.lang.Boolean hasUnescapedString(java.lang.String theString)
      This function checks a string to make sure that all characters listed in Escapable entities are escaped, and that the ampersands are part of an escape sequence of some kind.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • escapeAttribute

        public static java.lang.String escapeAttribute(java.lang.String attributeString)
        Returns an escaped version of the string suitable for inclusion in an XML attribute. An already escaped string will not be re-escaped.
        Parameters:
        attributeString - The string to escape.
        Returns:
        an escaped version of the string.

      • escapeElement

        public static java.lang.String escapeElement(java.lang.String theString)
        Check that the string does not contain any invalid XML characters, if no invalid characters, returns the string, otherwise checks that the characters are escaped properly. If not escaped properly wraps the string in CDATA[ ... ]]
        Parameters:
        theString - The string to escape.
        Returns:
        the string wrapped with CDATA[ ... ]]

      • hasUnescapedString

        public static java.lang.Boolean hasUnescapedString(java.lang.String theString)
        This function checks a string to make sure that all characters listed in Escapable entities are escaped, and that the ampersands are part of an escape sequence of some kind.
        Parameters:
        theString - the string to check for unescaped characters
        Returns:
        true if has unescaped characters, false otherwise.
